text: Violetta Ferrari (25 April 1930 - 23 January 2014) was a Hungarian actress. Ferrari was born in Hódmezővásárhely. She began working in 1950. She appeared mostly in stage performances. She left show business in 1983. Ferrari died on 23 January 2014, aged 85, in Budapest. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1930 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Hungarian movie actors Category:Hungarian stage actors Category:Hungarian television actors
title: Violetta Ferrari
